titles.title: To prohibit the use of any United States weapon, weapons system, munition, aircraft, vessel, boat, or other implement of war against Christian properties and Christian civilians in any foreign country.

To prohibit the use of any United States weapon, weapons system, munition, aircraft, vessel, boat, or other implement of war against Christian properties and Christian civilians in any foreign country.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.
